Package external

The external package contains interfaces for the external EntertainmentProviderSystem and PaymentSystem.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EntertainmentProviderSystem
    Interface for the external EntertainmentProviderSystem, it allows informing about changes made to events and bookings on our system, and querying for up-to-date number of available tickets for a given EventPerformance (in case ticket sales are made outside this system).
    PaymentSystem
    Interface for the external PaymentSystem (e.g., PayPal, Transferwise, or similar).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MockEntertainmentProviderSystem
    A mock implementation of EntertainmentProviderSystem, substituting real systems for testing purposes.
    MockPaymentSystem
    A mock implementation of PaymentSystem for testing purposes.
